channel.title: Need help getting Server up
channel.description: Subject basically tells it, I believe I'm done with my Server and I would like to make it possible so others can download it and play. So do I Upload the Server to UpIt or another Upload/Download site and give people that link or..? I put my no-ip, ip in the Source at Client.java and at the Client at Gui.Java was that right? If anyone could help I'd be willing to give Mod+ on the server Thanks in advance :D

item.title: Need help getting Server up
item.dc:creator: @overpaidpkr overpaidpkr
item.description:
@overpaidpkr wrote:

Ty Tom
…if only i could rep, but you have 200 so ehhh

Read full topic

item.title: Need help getting Server up
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“overpaidpkr, post:3, topic:374994”]Ok stupid question?
but im about to upload the client… when i want the client to be up do i have to have the .runserver batch running constantly?[/quote]

For people to connect you need to have your server online, so yes you need run.bat on.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help getting Server up
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Don’t offer things for help

To your question, you upload your client to a free host e.g

Uppit
Mediafire
Megaupload
Rapidshare
Multiupload

You use WinRar. Players then download it. You can change your IP in GUI.java/Client.java depending on what client it is. You just need to run your NO-IP and make sure you’ve followed the how to make a server tutorial correctly.

Read full topic
